data.fullContent: Self-Attribution is a first step in self-perception. Self Attribution is learning how to identify parts of a person's own self and individuality and why these came to be. When a person is young, other people such as relatives and instructors are relied upon to teach a person how to identify certain parts of their personalities. This person is slowly trained to make these sort of identifications themselves, and can then start making their own connections between certain traits and what may have caused those traits.
data.answer: 自我归因是自我感知的第一步。自我归因是学习如何识别一个人的部分自我和个性以及为什么会这样。当一个人年轻的时候，他会依赖其他的人，比如亲戚和导师来教他如何识别自己性格的某些部分。这个人被慢慢地训练自己做出这些识别，然后开始在某些特征和可能导致这些特征的因素之间建立他们自己的联系。
